=== Release ===

 * [ ] Update version
   * `module.py`
   * `setup.py`
   * `doc/*`
 * [ ] Update ChangeLog
   * `CHANGELOG`
   * `README`
 * [ ] Update Documentation
   * `*.py` docstrings
   * `doc/*`
   * Wiki pages
 * [ ] Upload to PyPI
